text: Mericella is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Cancellariidae, the nutmeg snails. ==Species== Species within the genus Mericella include: * Mericella bozzettii Petit & Harasewych, 1993 * Mericella cingulata (Olsson & Bayer, 1972) * Mericella corbicula (Dall, 1908) * Mericella gerda Olsson & Bayer, 1972 * Mericella jucunda (Thiele, 1925) * Mericella paschalis (Thiele, 1925) * Mericella santa Olsson & Bayer, 1972 ==References== Category:Cancellariidae
title: Mericella
